x_nuvo_diag_probes.description:
Check for broken reference records in the scheduled maintenance tables. ie. scheduled execution missing SMI.
Customers reporting work orders are missing the Procedure Task button. In the past when this happens we change the asset tag, save, then change asset tag back, save and then the Procedure Task becomes visible. This is not working.
SMI were missing the Checklist when the WO's were created from them.
x_nuvo_diag_probes.name: SMI broken reference record probe

sys_update_version.name: x_nuvo_diag_probes_52d975ce1b32291088b2777e0a4bcbdb
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_nuvo_diag_probes"><x_nuvo_diag_probes action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Check for broken reference records in the scheduled maintenance tables. ie. scheduled execution missing SMI.

Customers reporting work orders are missing the Procedure Task button. In the past when this happens we change the asset tag, save, then change asset tag back, save and then the Procedure Task becomes visible. This is not working.

SMI were missing the Checklist when the WO's were created from them. </description><healthcheck_type/><name>SMI broken reference record probe</name><order/><probe_type/><product_version/><remediation/><script><![CDATA[var util = new x_nuvo_diag.DiagnosticUtil();

var gr = new GlideRecord('x_nuvo_eam_clinical_scheduled_maint_definition');
gr.addEncodedQuery('pre_checklistISEMPTY^ORworking_checklistISEMPTY');
gr.query();

if(gr.next())
	util.handleOutput('Atleast one scheduled maintenance definition does not have a checklist applied to it. Work orders using that definition will not be able to utilize a checklist.','warning','HTM Asset Management');]]></script><sys_class_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>pierson.arnold@nuvolo.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-05-15 19:05:40</sys_created_on><sys_id>52d975ce1b32291088b2777e0a4bcbdb</sys_id><sys_mod_count>19</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SMI broken reference record probe</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Diagnostic Tool" source="x_nuvo_diag">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Diagnostic Tool">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes_52d975ce1b32291088b2777e0a4bcbdb</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Stefan.Popov@nuvolo.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-09-17 11:21:26</sys_updated_on><tool>diagnostic</tool></x_nuvo_diag_probes></record_update>
